name: s t a y a w a y
name_original: s t a y a w a y
description:
S T A Y    A W A Y

A retro arcade game heavily inspired by the Pacifism mode from Geometry Wars.
Created with love for the #StaySafeJam
Please stay at home and self isolate during these crazy times. If we join in #Solidarity and #StayAway we can get through this together.

I hope you enjoy the game!  -- Cody

HOW TO PLAY

Navigate your ship while avoiding the red enemies.
Travel through the gates with enemies nearby in order to clear the field and earn points.
Survive as long as you can to earn a high score.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys (D-Pad) - Navigate Your Ship
X - To Begin Game

Enter (Select) - Options / Toggle Music
